name: Tangle in the graveyard
description:
Made for the Kenney 2020 game jam, uses the natue and graveyard packs

source code: https://github.com/doodleasa/Tangle-in-the-graveyard (please don't even try, i couldn't bear to know anyone looked at this)

You are a grave digger who must traverse the most dangerous graveyard in the state to pay your respects to your sister. If you tread onto the wrong ground you might find yourself dead.

cover art by @cactuspearss
